at.irian.ankor.ref.listener

Class RefListeners

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.irian.ankor.ref.listener.RefListeners

  • public final class RefListeners
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for adding convenient ref listeners to a Ref. These ref listeners are simplified event listeners.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void addChangeListener(Ref ref, RefChangeListener listener)
      Adds a listener, that is invoked on every view model change and automatically discarded when the given Ref gets invalid.
      static void addPropActionListener(Ref ref, RefActionListener listener)
      Adds a listener, that is invoked on every action fired on the given ref.
      static void addPropChangeListener(Ref ref, RefChangeListener listener)
      Adds a listener, that is invoked on every change of the property referenced by the given ref.
      static void addTreeChangeListener(Ref ref, RefChangeListener listener)
      Adds a listener, that is invoked on every change of the property referenced by the given ref or any other property that is a descendant of the given ref.
      static void removeListener(RefContext refContext, RefListener listener) 
      static void removeListener(Ref ref, RefListener listener) 

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
